<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### AllCallSitesDevirted {#a84d3e2451a78887146475d5f1e687b74}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;WholeProgramDevirt.cpp&#125;::CallSiteInfo::AllCallSitesDevirted = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a></>}>
Whether all call sites represented by this <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-wholeprogramdevirt-cpp-/callsiteinfo">CallSiteInfo</a>, including those in summaries, have been devirtualized.

This starts off as true because a default constructed <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-wholeprogramdevirt-cpp-/callsiteinfo">CallSiteInfo</a> represents no call sites.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp/#l00495">495</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp">WholeProgramDevirt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### CallSites {#a4c34f9725a50f48351c04484e7c151e0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;VirtualCallSite&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;WholeProgramDevirt.cpp&#125;::CallSiteInfo::CallSites</>}>
The set of call sites for this slot.

Used during regular LTO and the import phase of ThinLTO (as well as the export phase of ThinLTO for any call sites that appear in the merged module itself); in each of these cases we are directly operating on the call sites at the IR level.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp/#l00490">490</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp">WholeProgramDevirt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### SummaryHasTypeTestAssumeUsers {#a8caa5307b4dd65a69d3d7bb4be12491a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;WholeProgramDevirt.cpp&#125;::CallSiteInfo::SummaryHasTypeTestAssumeUsers = false</>}>
Whether any function summary contains an llvm.assume(llvm.type.test) for this slot.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp/#l00502">502</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp">WholeProgramDevirt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### SummaryTypeCheckedLoadUsers {#a048cde5a3dc1734d95364bb8bf08430b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;FunctionSummary &#42;&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;WholeProgramDevirt.cpp&#125;::CallSiteInfo::SummaryTypeCheckedLoadUsers</>}>
CFI-specific: a vector containing the list of function summaries that use the llvm.type.checked.load intrinsic and therefore will require resolutions for llvm.type.test in order to implement CFI checks if devirtualization was unsuccessful.

If devirtualization was successful, the pass will clear this vector by calling <a href="#af92dbd7f8b58ee509f6d50304aadf83b">markDevirt()</a>. If at the end of the pass the vector is non-empty, we will need to add a use of llvm.type.test to each of the function summaries in the vector.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp/#l00511">511</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp">WholeProgramDevirt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### SummaryTypeTestAssumeUsers {#adf2ae6a7ede47eba36231cfe92470cfe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;FunctionSummary &#42;&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;WholeProgramDevirt.cpp&#125;::CallSiteInfo::SummaryTypeTestAssumeUsers</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp/#l00512">512</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/wholeprogramdevirt-cpp">WholeProgramDevirt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
